attributes.action: consign to the political dustbin the newly invented imprecise term "UK" and ask that the precise specific country names of England, Scotland and Wales be returned to all the people living in those countries. I live in England and wish my goverment to ensure that I can specifically and precisely use "England" as my place of residence. I grew up in England, I studied in England and the country I lived in used to be England. I have not moved to another country. I choose to continue to live in a real country with real history called England not the UK!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
